chunks.text: Welcome back to Chai or Code.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Now, when everyone has understood how to get the first page of HTML,
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: how to install VS Code, and how to write our first code.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Let's talk a little about HTML.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: I know very well that you all know that
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: when you write an H2 tag, the heading is big and when you write a H1 tag,
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: the heading is always a little small.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Smaller.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: But it's not like that.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: There is a reason behind it and it will strengthen the foundation and structure of your HTML.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Many people believe that HTML is okay for a big or smaller H1 tag,
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: but I know that many of you know that
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: by using CSS, you can increase any H2 tag from H1 heading.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: So, what does it mean in HTML?
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Write everything in the paragraph, give everyone classes and IDs.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Why do you need to pay attention to HTML?
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: HTML is a markup language.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: You will see the full form which you can read on Google.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: But I don't want you to remember it as a markup language.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: I want you to remember it as a syntactical language.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Simple and declarative language.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: What does this language do? It makes the structure of your page.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: So, this is a structural language and not just that.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: There are many other structural languages.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: In fact, many people divide it into presentational structural language
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: and descriptive structural language.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: There are many more names.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And only HTML is not a structural language.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: You have a markdown, latex, and many other languages.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: But the support of this is the most in the browser.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: That's why HTML is so popular.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And all the tags of this are important to yourself.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: H1 doesn't mean that the heading will be big there.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And H2 doesn't mean that the heading will be small there.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: H1 means that the core part of the page is the headings.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: These are the most important things.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Similarly, when you write the heading 2,
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: it is a subheading.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: These are the second important things.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And Google, Yahoo, Yandex, all the search engines understand these things well.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: What many people do?
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: You must have seen it.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Simply, they write the footer.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And they write the paragraph in the footer.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And they write their address here.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: You can write it. No problem.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: You can take it to the footer with CSS.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: But many people don't have to spend much.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: They write their ranking and address on Google.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: They simply write the footer.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And then they include all the paragraphs in the address tag.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Google automatically knows it.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Because you knew the HTML language well.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Google knows it.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: It took your address from the structure and from the address.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And then it listed it.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: So, you will have the best knowledge of HTML.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Not because it makes the headings bigger and smaller.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Because it is an important part of every tag.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And that importance makes the structure of your page.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: I think it is getting more interesting now.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Okay.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: So, let's start.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: First, to know what is important and what should be known.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: As soon as we write the exclamation, we hit the tab.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: So, we know that this is a basic structure.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: But as soon as we went to the first line, we got the dot type.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: All the tags of HTML, we call them tags.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: All these tags are insensitive.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: You can write the head if you want.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: It doesn't matter if you write the head.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: But usually, in most cases, you keep them lower case.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: The first tag is the dot type.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: As I told you, in the beginning of the internet,
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: all these were not HTML.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: There were XML, there were XHTML, there were latex.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: So, your document can be of any type.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: This thing only tells the browser that the document we are serving is of HTML type.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: After this, we said HTML.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And obviously, the whole world is in foreign language.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: HTML is popular now.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: So, we have to define the language.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: It is in English, Hindi, Japanese or any other language.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: After that, the most important part is that we remove all these.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: The structure of HTML is something like this.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And to know more about this, HTML is always like this.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: There are two children of HTML.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: We need to know this terminology.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Because after this, we will learn DOM.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And all this is important for DOM.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Notice, here is the hierarchy.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Here is HTML.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: There are two children in it.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Head and body.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And in the body, you can add more children.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: You can add all children in the head.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Like I added the title.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: I will give its name as simply title.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: In the body, I simply added an H1 and wrote the test.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: So, our relation of HTML is with the title grandchild.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: It is not like you have to go inside the grandchild.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Usually, parents, child and grandchild are related to this.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: There can be more.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: It is not like that.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: There is another tag in H1 that can give you more values.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: But we will not do that.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: What is important for you to know is that I will tell you all that here.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: In HTML, we wrote the head and the body in the head.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Now, when we go to a web page,
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: the page you see here is all the part of your body.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Which is the visual aspect.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: There are only two things that are visual in the head.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: The first part is your title.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And the second part is the favicon.

chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: You can go to any other website.

chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: Like here, you have a small icon.

chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: You have a small icon of the VS Code.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: All this is the favicon.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And it is not like you need to remember the syntax.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: You should know that I want to apply the favicon.
chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3
chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: So, you simply go here.

chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.text: And simply, as you write the favicon in the titles,

chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.title: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4

chunks.audio_file: Core structure of HTML and Meta tags ｜ Hindi.mp4.mp3

text: Welcome back to Chai or Code. Now, when everyone has understood how to get the first page of HTML, how to install VS Code, and how to write our first code. Let's talk a little about HTML. I know very well that you all know that when you write an H2 tag, the heading is big and when you write a H1 tag, the heading is always a little small. Smaller. But it's not like that. There is a reason behind it and it will strengthen the foundation and structure of your HTML. Many people believe that HTML is okay for a big or smaller H1 tag, but I know that many of you know that by using CSS, you can increase any H2 tag from H1 heading. So, what does it mean in HTML? Write everything in the paragraph, give everyone classes and IDs. Why do you need to pay attention to HTML? HTML is a markup language. You will see the full form which you can read on Google. But I don't want you to remember it as a markup language. I want you to remember it as a syntactical language. Simple and declarative language. What does this language do? It makes the structure of your page. So, this is a structural language and not just that. There are many other structural languages. In fact, many people divide it into presentational structural language and descriptive structural language. There are many more names. And only HTML is not a structural language. You have a markdown, latex, and many other languages. But the support of this is the most in the browser. That's why HTML is so popular. And all the tags of this are important to yourself. H1 doesn't mean that the heading will be big there. And H2 doesn't mean that the heading will be small there. H1 means that the core part of the page is the headings. These are the most important things. Similarly, when you write the heading 2, it is a subheading. These are the second important things. And Google, Yahoo, Yandex, all the search engines understand these things well. What many people do? You must have seen it. Simply, they write the footer. And they write the paragraph in the footer. And they write their address here. You can write it. No problem. You can take it to the footer with CSS. But many people don't have to spend much. They write their ranking and address on Google. They simply write the footer. And then they include all the paragraphs in the address tag. Google automatically knows it. Because you knew the HTML language well. Google knows it.
